ygData.subject: RE: Off Topic : UO
ygData.msgSnippet: It all depend on yaself.  UO doesnt have much bugs right now to explore.  I myself also use 400k-500k to power train my GM smith.  It s also not like last time
ygData.messageBody:
It all depend on yaself. UO doesnt have much bugs right now to explore. I
myself also use 400k-500k to power train my GM smith. It's also not like
last time where u can spar with pets to rise melee skills.

Power training to a kickass player in one month is not a problem, but
unlike EQ, tactics do play an impt part in UO. Lag is also a big issue
here. I got 5 power-trained chars in UO, but lag also force me to migrate
into EQ. I'm now keeping the account hoping lag will improve in future,
then I will go back UO.

Ziltus

On Thursday, 15 July, 1999 2:48 PM, Wilson [SMTP:ritzbits@...]
wrote:
> Pardon me people.
>
> Hey LKW, if I head down to Baja, think you can scrap me into a kickass
player in 1 month time?
>
> Wilson
